title: Value to Safe Integer
description: In this lab, we will explore a JavaScript function that helps ensure safe integer values. We will learn how to convert a given value to a safe integer using a combination of Math.max(), Math.min(), and Math.round() methods. This lab will help you understand how to handle large numbers and prevent integer overflow errors in your JavaScript code.

meta.description: Learn how to use JavaScript functions to convert values to safe integers and prevent integer overflow errors.
